subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: 2012 is not the end!

Ah...That's MUCH better ;)

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Rj 
  T=
o: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, October 15, 2009 9:47 AM
  Su=
bject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: 2012 is not the end!


    REVISED:  One thing I t=
hink we can all agree on:  No one knows it all . Not me, not you, and certa=
inly not a collapsed MesoAmerican civilization.  Only April.

        There=
. :-)

        --- On Thu, 10/15/09, April Abercrombie <april@abercrombiegh=
ostresearch.com> wrote:


          From: April Abercrombie <april@abercrom=
bieghostresearch.com>
          Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: 2012 is not the =
end!
          To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
          Date: Thursday, Octobe=
r 15, 2009, 8:44 AM


            

          [One thing I think we can all=
 agree on:  one knows it all. Not me, not you, and certainly not a collapse=
d MesoAmerican civilization. ]

          I do.


          Just teasin' ;)=


            ----- Original Message ----- 
            From: Rj 
         =
   To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com 
            Sent: Thursday, October 15, 20=
09 8:46 AM
            Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: 2012 is not the end!


  =
            
                  F-S, I certainly hope I didn't offend you wi=
th anything I said.  I certainly do not claim to be a braniac or a know-it-=
all, as you have called me in your post.

                  In fact I am sa=
ying the opposite: I am saying that I do not know:  I am saying I do not kn=
ow how anyone can believe these 2012 predictions when all they have is stor=
ies and questionable claims.  I don't know how they can believe this stuff =
when they actually DO have evidence that all the similar claims in the past=
 have been shown to be false. I do not know why they believe this claim is =
any more justified than all the others,

                  I do not know ho=
w the group can say on its home page " It's one thing to be skeptical, it's=
 another to ignore and deny all evidence.", yet it is the people who are ce=
rtain of the 2012 prophecies that seem to be ignoring and denying evidence =
that it is only one more in a long line of unsupported failed predictions, =
not those who are skeptical of it.

                  I do not know how it =
justifies you referring to me as  a "wanne be brianiacs claiming to know al=
l", when the group home page suggests such attacks get people banned.  I do=
 not know how being skeptical of a future prophecy makes one a know it all.=
 And I do not know how prompting people to judge for themselves makes me a =
know it all. 

                  And I don't know why the group home page s=
ays a good argument is ok, yet you start name-calling offended when someone=
 questions something you do not agree with, or proposes a theory alternate =
to your own.

                  So call me ignorant.  Obviously I really do=
n't know very much at all.  

                  But of the very few things =
I do know, I now it is good to question, and not take everything, especiall=
y prophecies, at face value.  And I know the best way to test a prophecy, a=
nd the people making them, is to see if they actually come to pass.  And I =
know that since no evidence can support a prophecy's truth until it comes t=
o pass, and since all past end-of-world prophecies have no evidence of thei=
r success, that those who think they know something special about why 2012 =
is different, certainly know more than I.

                  And so I hope =
they (or you, if you count yourself among them) will post your evidence, an=
d your predictions, and your dates.  And we won't have to argue about it.  =
We can just put that person, and their predictions, and their dates, on our=
 calendars, and judge when the date comes, who was really acting as a know-=
it-all.  

                  One thing I think we can all agree on:  one kn=
ows it all. Not me, not you, and certainly not a collapsed MesoAmerican civ=
ilization.

                  Rj





                  --- On Wed, 10/14/0=
9, purplespacefriend <purplealiengirl@ gmail.com> wrote:


                =
    From: purplespacefriend <purplealiengirl@ gmail.com>
                  =
  Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: 2012 is not the end!
                    To: EVP-I=
TC@yahoogroups .com
                    Date: Wednesday, October 14, 2009, =
6:56 PM


                      
                    I stopped getting the =
group e-mail months ago, I should also stop reading the posts as well. All =
these groups are full of wanne be brianiacs claiming to know all, and laugh=
 at anyone that gets voices outside of the little micro paranormal world. A=
nd that is not aimed at April!--RJ

                    F-S

              =
      --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com, "April Abercrombie" <april@...> wrot=
e:
                    >
                    > Wow..some how, I missed gett=
ing a bunch of messages it appears.
                    > 
                =
    > To Frank - don't shoot the messenger. Just sayin'
                   =
 > 
                    > ----- Original Message ----- 
                   =
 > From: Rj 
                    > To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com 
          =
          > Sent: Wednesday, October 14, 2009 4:13 PM
                    >=
 Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: 2012 is not the end!
                    > 
   =
                 > 
                    > Other than various claims, there =
is no evidence that anything will happen in 2012: it will be the same as ev=
ery other end-of-world prediction made before.
                    > 
     =
               > Then someone will "recalculate" , or proclaim a new EVP me=
ssage, and point at 2013! Or 2014! 
                    > 
                =
    > However, I really do like it when people pick specific dates for pred=
ictions. Besides being entertaining, it gives everyone a chance to judge fo=
r themselves just how much the predictor is like all the others who have ma=
rched around carrying those "THE END OF THE WORLD IS NIGH" signs. Full of n=
othing but themselves and their delusions.
                    > 
         =
           > --- On Wed, 10/14/09, purplespacefriend <purplealiengirl@ ...>=
 wrote:
                    > 
                    > 
                    >=
 From: purplespacefriend <purplealiengirl@ ...>
                    > Subje=
ct: [EVP-ITC] Re: 2012 is not the end!
                    > To: EVP-ITC@ya=
hoogroups .com
                    > Date: Wednesday, October 14, 2009, 2:5=
9 PM
                    > 
                    > 
                    > 
 =
                   > And you can expect the debunking to escalate, but go a=
head--everyone knows the media always tells the truth. 
                   =
 > Trillions of $$$ are missing, and some suspect it's been used to build s=
ecret bunkers for the elite to ride out the shift in, and you think they ar=
e not going to spend a bit more on dis-information to keep panicked hords f=
rom over running their hidy holes. 
                    > 
                =
    > These same sources you quote will also tell you there are no sprits, =
hence no EVP, yet you don't believe that. 
                    > 
         =
           > Besides, it is not just the Mayans, every freaking culture in =
the world has the exact same predictions- the exact same date-just coincide=
nce no doubt! You expect some bozo that has as much in common with mayan ca=
lendar creators as I have with the man in the moon to know anything at all =
about it. I can go and on...Experts all and everyone has an opinion that is=
 gospel and unquestionable. You can find any information you want to hear, =
whether it's EVP or 2012.
                    > 
                    > You =
better take a closer look at your world, if nothing happens to change this =
crap hole, the future is extrememly bleak-- a slow rotting death that goes =
on for milenia. 
                    > 
                    > F-S
         =
           >
